Reviews.Title: Do Not Waste Your Time and Money
Reviews.Author: randykhorses
Reviews.Content: I have had this phone for 2 months. It has been the worst phone I have ever owned. It is always freezing, my ringer doesn't work, and screen freaks out all the time. Don't waste your money..

Reviews.Title: iPhone look a like
Reviews.Author: RedLover
Reviews.Content: Over all it's a decent phone but the camera is suckish and I tend to take a lot of pictures so I should of thought about it before buying it . If you're looking for a cool android it's the right phone for you unless you like taking pictures all the time.

Reviews.Title: Its Okay
Reviews.Author: Nikeey
Reviews.Content: The phone I am very happy with, Me and my partner got 1 each.Delivery took longer than stated. But the product really made up for it, Only down fall I guess would be that the battery goes flat within 24hrs. Initially I thought it was because of the constant use but 1 day I hardly used it and the battery still went flat fast.It did come with a spare battery that you could have charged and carry around with you but hey with our busy lives these days who has the brain capacity to remember the extra phone battery.

Reviews.Title: Don't waste your money!!!
Reviews.Author: Horribly terrible
Reviews.Content: I ordered this phone February 3rd, and did not receive it until March 20th. and it was not even the same phone in the picture and I wasn't notified that that phone was no longer made until after I contacted the seller. The "newer" version of this phone is horrible the battery dies to fast, the camera is horrible and I can not send or receive any pictures.

Reviews.Title: update
Reviews.Author: narkara
Reviews.Content: well this phone was great but I started having problem when my husband drop it after that I will call people and if they didn't answer the phone I couldn't hang it up because the screen was black I had to put the headset in to hang it up and just yesterday my son dropped it on ground it landed face down the screen broke and the phone when black  so if your going to get this phone just get a real good case to protect it

Reviews.Title: horrible
Reviews.Author: Pria B "PB"
Reviews.Content: the phone was alright when i recieved it. it was a lot lighter then the iPhone and a iPhone cover will not fit the phone because it is a lot thicker. the phone started giving me problems the second week i was using it. the speakers just stopped working i couldn't listen to music or hear calls they could hear me but i could not hear them. the phone would sometimes let me use wifi and other times it just said there were no wifi networks available but i was using it in my house. also the battery life is horrible it only lasts like 3 hours before it dies. i do not recommend buying the phone. it is not the iPhone experience, its not even close.

Reviews.Title: it look just like an iphone
Reviews.Author: lexy
Reviews.Content: I love this phone it just took to long to come...I find me a good phone I don't have to keep getting phones that I don't like..

3.5 inch 5 point Multi-touch Capacitive Screen, with 320*480 resolution Operation System: Android 4.0 ice cream sandwich
2G network:GSM:850/900/1800/1900MHZ + 3G network:GSM:2100MHZ compatible
CPU : MTK6575, Cortex A9, 1.0GHz + GPU Power SGX531T + 512MB RAM + 2GB ROM WIFI:802.11b/g + 3G for wireless internet 2.0 Mega pixel camera, dual camera
Build in GPS, Support Compass and navigation.(navigation software is not included in this listing) Flash player built in, you can visit youtube or other video site directly via browser. Access tons of free apps, games, ringtones and more with the Android Marketplace/Google play store.
velvet case, car charger, mobile power bank included
